title: How much did I need to wait for Pulsefire Caitlyn?
body: I just want to know it. Riot don't play with my heart please  {{item:3070}} {{champion:51}}

replies.body: I want to know too!  We don't have info on new content until it's been announced.  The[ patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-710-notes) state that it's aimed to release at some point during the patch.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page, and hang tight!

Hello Jinx, 

This does not belong in this forum, however there is speculation (based from what I have heard as a player) that it will come out later this patch or the next patch. I hope this helps!

But in the patch notes you can clearly see Pulsefure Caitlyn, to be honest I can't understand the sense of letting us wait for more than an entire week.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Riot are being scumbags by making people wait. It will most likely be out on Thursday after the Karma bundle goes away.
